titre: A glowing fireball floats and travels
texte: A hyper-photorealistic Black man wearing a cozy sweater covered with hundreds of tiny white ghost patterns. He stands in front of a plain wall painted with Halloween tones: #DE0067, #0DFCFE, and #FFCC00. A glowing fireball floats and travels in front of him, casting strong dramatic shadows on his face and body. The fireball leaves a trail of sparkling light particles behind. The mood is spooky yet playful, cinematic, ultra-detailed, Halloween atmosphere.
description: boule ajoutée en compositing AE et retravaillée par IA
